com.facebook.react.bridge

Class ReactApplicationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactContext
          • com.facebook.react.bridge.ReactApplicationContext

  • public class ReactApplicationContext
extends ReactContext
    A context wrapper that always wraps Android Application Context and CatalystInstance by extending ReactContext
